definition: Beidaihe district of Qinhuangdao city 秦皇島市|秦皇岛市[Qin2 huang2 dao3 shi4], Hebei
north/(classical) to be defeated
surname Dai
to put on or wear (glasses, hat, gloves etc)/to respect/to bear/to support
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
Beidaihe district of Qinhuangdao city 秦皇島市|秦皇岛市[Qin2 huang2 dao3 shi4], Hebei

sentences.english: Help wanted for our Beidaihe School Trip.
sentences.chinese: 我们的北戴河学校之旅需要帮助。

sentences.english: In the eyes of ordinary people, Beidaihe is an unattainable place.
sentences.chinese: 在老百姓眼中，北戴河是一个可望而不可即的地方。

sentences.english: They have decided to go on a visit to the seaside in Beidaihethis summer.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定这个夏天去北戴河海边游玩。

sentences.english: Objective To take advantage of the natural recuperation factors in Beidaihe sanitariums completely.
sentences.chinese: 目的充分发挥北戴河疗养胜地自然疗养因子优势。

sentences.english: The railroad runs extra trains to Beidaihe Beach during summer vacations.
sentences.chinese: 暑假期间铁路局增开去北戴河海滨的列车。

sentences.english: The Beidaihe inland water transportation is extremely developed, it is interlinked with the Beijing-Hangzhou Canal.
sentences.chinese: 北戴河内河运输十分发达，与京杭大运河相通。

sentences.english: Will you be taking your leave in Beidaihe?
Beidaihe is a beautiful place about two hour's drive from Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北戴河是处美丽的地方，距离北京有两小时的车程。

sentences.english: Did you eat seafoods in Beidaihe?
sentences.chinese: 在北戴河你们吃海鲜了吗？

sentences.english: Beidaihe is located in the west part of Qinhuangdao City, in Hebei Province.
sentences.chinese: 北戴河海滨在河北省秦皇岛市的西部。

sentences.english: For example, you may visit Beidaihe on the way to Harbin.
sentences.chinese: 例如您在去哈尔滨途中，可以到北戴河。

sentences.english: Beidaihe is one of the most attractive summer seaside resorts in Northern China.
sentences.chinese: 北戴河是中国北方的一个很迷人的海滨避暑胜地。

sentences.english: The hot weather antedated my departure for Beidaihe.
sentences.chinese: 炎热的天气使我提前动身前往北戴河。

sentences.english: Yingjiaoshi (Eagle's Horn Stone) in the east is a noted attraction in Beidaihe.
sentences.chinese: 东边的鹰角石是北戴河非常著名的景点。

sentences.english: Are you going to BeidaiHe this weekend?
sentences.chinese: 这个周末去北戴河玩吗？

definition: Qinhuangdao prefecture level city in Hebei

Suizhong county in Huludao 葫蘆島|葫芦岛, Liaoning
name of various places including Gold Coast (Australian city), Gold Coast (former British colony in Africa) and Costa Daurada (area on the coast of Catalonia, Spain)
Lake Baiyangdian
Bohai Bay
Badaling, a particular section of the Great Wall that is a favorite tourist destination
Ji county in Tianjin 天津[Tian1 jin1]
Chengde prefecture-level city in Hebei/also Chengde county
Xincheng county level city in Huludao 葫蘆島|葫芦岛[Hu2 lu2 dao3], Liaoning

Weihai prefecture level city in Shandong
